## Checklist

### Before Submitting
- [ ] My code follows the [PowerShell style guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md#coding-standards)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md under "Unreleased" section
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested migration workflows end-to-end

### Security
- [ ] I have not introduced any security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not exposed any secrets or credentials
- [ ] Input validation has been implemented where applicable

### Documentation
- [ ] README.md updated if needed
- [ ] Skills documentation updated if applicable
- [ ] Code comments added for complex logic
- [ ] Examples provided for new features

## Additional Notes

<!-- Any additional information, dependencies, or considerations -->

---

**Reviewer Guidelines:**
- Verify all checklist items are complete
- Test migration workflows if source systems are affected
- Review security implications
- Ensure documentation is clear and complete
